slug.description: Unique identifier for this branch of the experiment.

value.description: Value to set the preference to for this branch

ratio.description: Ratio of users who should be grouped into this branch.

items.description: A branch in a preference experiment

preferenceName.description: Full dotted path of the preference that controls this experiment

preferenceType.description: Data type of the preference that controls this experiment

preferenceBranchType.description: Controls whether the default or user value of the preference is modified.

experimentDocumentUrl.description: URL of a document describing the experiment

isEnrollmentPaused.description: If true, new users will not be enrolled in the study.

isHighVolume.description: If true, marks the preference as a high population experiment that should be excluded from certain types of telemetry.

PreferenceExperimentArguments.description: Run a feature experiment activated by a preference
